header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 215-40r18 drivers
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 215-40r18 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 215/40R18 Tire Size 
The 215/40R18 tires are commonly found on passenger cars like hatchbacks, CUVs, and performance sedans. 215/40R18 sized tires are offered in categories that include All-Season, Ultra-High-Performance (UHP), Summer, Performance, and Autocross.

These 215/40R18 tires are most commonly used on popular vehicles like Toyota 86, Fiat Grande Punto, Mercedes-Benz B-Class, BMW 1 Series, Subaru BRZ, Volkswagen Passat, Audi A1, Dodge Stratus, Hyundai Veloster, Saab N-3, Peugeot 2008, Citroen DS3 and more.

All-season tires are the most common tires that are suited for dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Have a look at the [Bridgestone Potenza RE980AS](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/potenza-re980as#v=1&tireSize=215-40r18&mpn=000155&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=171097&curationSource=none&productPos=24), Yokohama Advan Sport A/S Plus, and Kumho Ecsta PA51 if you need a 215/40R18 sized all-season tire that can offer year-round traction.

Ultra-High Performance (UHP) tires are used on sports and supercars in warm weather and they offer good handling and quick acceleration. Consider the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus#v=1&tireSize=215-40zr18&mpn=15572670000&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=206668&curationSource=none&productPos=4), Firestone Firehawk Indy 500, and Kumho Ecsta PS31 if you need an ultra-high performance tire that’s made to offer extraordinary performance.

Whether you need an all-season, UHP, winter, all-terrain, or any other type of tire, SimpleTire has a wide range of 215/40R18 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!
